verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> out of the <S%H1710>fish's<s%> <S%H4578>belly,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> by reason of my <S%H6869>affliction<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me; out of the <S%H990>belly<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H7768>cried<s%> I, and you <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

For you had <S%H7993>cast<s%> me into the <S%H4688>deep,<s%> in the <S%H3824>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about: <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4867>billows<s%> and your <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> me.

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I am <S%H1644>cast<s%> out of your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me about, even to the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> the <S%H8415>depth<s%> <S%H5437>closed<s%> me <S%H5437>round<s%> about, the <S%H5488>weeds<s%> were <S%H2280>wrapped<s%> about my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

I <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7095>bottoms<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H1280>bars<s%> was <S%H1157>about<s%> me for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> yet have you <S%H5927>brought<s%> up my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>corruption,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

When my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in to you, <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

But I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to you with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> that that I have <S%H5087>vowed.<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> is of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1709>fish,<s%> and it <S%H6958>vomited<s%> out <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land.<s%>
